name: Undead World
description:
The world is getting into a dark era, you must be the hero that save it.

Action rpg that containst fast-Paced combat and survival elements. Use your skills to defeat the Undead.

Try to find equiment and kill the enemies that are close. Find a way to escape the island.



Features different gameplay options.

-Fight the enemies and try to survive as much possible.

-Use different kind of weaponry and magic.

-Find hidden items across maps.
